item.title: Build a Donkey Car (Part 1 of 2)
item.description: Building our First Donkey Car Donkey Car is an opensource project for developing self-driving small scale cars. Over the weekend, my daughter and I built one! We found the Donkey Car docs a bit difficult to follow, and just plain wrong, in a few places. Yet we managed to muddle our way through, despite a few mistakes along the way. Here’s what we ended up doing. The Parts Here are the parts we ordered to build the car (prices as-of 2018-12-09:
